title: Hello, my name is Svyatoslav, and I am glad to welcome you to my portfolio!

description.p1: I've been developing front-end applications for over 13 months. Actively over the past year developed and studied new technologies in the field of web development. Most part of time dedicated to working with React and Next.js, and also gained experience in writing the backend part of applications using Nest.js.
description.p2: At the moment I am a second-year student at the Kharkov National University of Radio Electronics, studying in the specialty "Computer Engineering".
description.p3: My goal is to gain commercial development experience, expand my teamwork skills, and meet more experienced developers. I strive for constant development and am ready for new challenges and tasks.
